item.field: Danny Denzongpa, Mahendra Sandhu, Rekha, Faryal, Helen, Jagdeep
As a crazed killer blazes a trail of blood through an anxious city, a hardened cop aims to take him down by any means in this remake of “Dirty Harry.”
Mariusz Dmochowski, Ewa Krzyżewska, Włodzimierz Boruński, Andrzej Mrowiec, Józef Rosiński, Piotr Kąkolewski, Beata Nowicka, Edmund Fetting, Grażyna Staniszewska, Andrzej Łapicki
Tormented by mistrust, a businessman hires a cagey tailor to track his wife's whereabouts with her doctor only to send his mind further down an abyss.
Debbie Reynolds, Charles Nelson Reilly, Paul Lynde, Henry Gibson, Rex Allen, Danny Bonaduce, Pamelyn Ferdin, Don Messick, Agnes Moorehead, Martha Scott, John Stephenson, Herb Vigran, Dave Madden
Follow the adventures of Wilbur the pig, Templeton the rat and Charlotte the spider in this animated musical version of E.B. White's timeless story.
Tamara Dobson, Bernie Casey, BrendaSykes, Esther Rolle, Shelley Winters
A stylin' special agent chases down drug lords and does her part to stop trafficking. Soon, she finds herself seeking revenge on a dealer.
Bruce Lee, John Saxon, Jim Kelly, Ahna Capri, Kien Shih, Robert Wall, Angela Mao, Betty Chung, Geoffrey Weeks, Bolo Yeung, Peter Archer
Recruited by a British agent, Shaolin master Lee infiltrates a remote island and a brutal martial arts tournament to spy on a sinister crime lord.
Jimi Hendrix, Eric Clapton, Billy Cox
Jimi Hendrix's family, friends, and fellow musicians discuss his life and influence. Hendrix also appears in classic performance footage.
Qiu Yuen, Charlie Chin, Jackie Chan, Hu Chin, Nan Chiang
Aided only by a tough female police officer, a Hong Kong taxi driver tries to escape from gangsters pursuing incriminating evidence left in his cab.
Robert De Niro, Harvey Keitel, David Proval, Amy Robinson, Richard Romanus, Cesare Danova, Victor Argo, George Memmoli
In New York's Little Italy, a low-level hoodlum wrestles with loyalty to his mobster uncle, his faith and his friendship with an inveterate gambler.
Rishi Kapoor, Dimple Kapadia, Pran, Prem Nath, Sonia Sahni, Durga Khote, Aruna Irani, Prem Chopra, Farida Jalal
Raj, the son of strict, wealthy parents, falls in love with Bobby, the daughter of a poor Christian fisherman – a romance his parents oppose.
